channel.title: Home on kgdn.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Home on kgdn.xyz

item.title: Now
item.description: This is a now page which is a page that tells you what I’m up to right now. Currently working on improving my dissertation project, Buffet, which is a web application that allows users to test various GNU/Linux distributions in a web browser. The project has already been submitted for assessment, but I’m continuing to work on it to improve the user experience and add new features. It will be available on GitHub soon, under the permissive and open-source GNU Affero General Public License v3.

item.title: A Fresh Start
item.description: Alright, let’s do this one more time. Hello! I’m Kieran, and this is my blog. I had a blog before, hosted on this same domain, but I decided to start fresh. I’ve learned a lot since I started that blog, and I wanted to start anew with a fresh perspective. So, here we are. Let’s talk about what you can expect from this blog. What to Expect Firstly, I’m going to be writing about a lot of different things.
